issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
It would be nice if users of the Titanium SDK could take advantage of the added security that is available by using Mutual (2way) authentication. 

Right now it doesn't not appear possible to provide the server with a PFX certificate to prove the clients identity. 

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mutual_authentication
fields.summary: Add support for mutual ssl authentication
